name: The Last Guardian VR Demo
description:
In The Last Guardian, players discover a fantastical beast named Trico, who acts as companion and protector as the two traverse a mysterious fantasy world. Step inside the world from The Last Guardian with PlayStation VR to interact with Trico in a whole new way.



PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
